channel.title: Upvest API updates
channel.description: Updates of the API release notes

item.title: v1.36.0 Driving licence as a valid KYC document [TEST]
item.description:
Operating models: TOL
Added a new document_type for the KYC (Know Your Customer) check.

item.title: v1.35.0 New transaction type
item.description:
Operating models: TOL, BYOL
New transaction type VIRTUAL_CASH_CORRECTION
